PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-02492011-02-17IC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActRadiocommunication Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Radiocommunication Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the RADIOCOMMUNICATION REGULATIONS, in order to repeal those sections of the Regulations identified as redundant as well as the provision which is considered to be inconsistent with the Charter of Rights and Freedoms, to repeal or amend those sections which do not reflect the legislative intent of the Act, and to make corrections and clarifications as requested by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0047 Publication Date: 2011-03-02
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Radiocommunication Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
